name: Fighting For My Life
content: Dark is dowm, but stars will come
黑夜过后 满天繁星
Rain is down, but rainbow will come
雨过天晴 彩虹挂天空
I can't fly, but dream is mine
我不能飞翔 但我有梦
I can fight for my life
For the end, across the dark
直到最后 穿过黑暗
I have strenght, across my heart
Sweat is down, I'm standing on
汗流浃背 我依然站立
Road is long, I'm running on
路虽长 我仍在奔跑
For the end, across the dark
直到最后 穿过黑暗
I have strenght, across my heart
Sweat is down, I'm standing on
汗流浃背 我依然站立
Road is long, I'm running on
路虽长 我仍在奔跑
